Title: Polobubo residents lament as  ₦596m Delta hospital becomes ‘monument of neglect’
Summary: Residents of Polobubo (Tsekelewu) in Delta State have appealed to Governor Sheriff Oborevwori to intervene in the long-standing abandonment of a cottage hospital in their community . In an open letter, they link the facility’s inactivity to ongoing maternal and child deaths .

Title: HURIWA slams Tinubu’s 2025 Rivers budget presentation as unconstitutional
Summary: The Human Rights Writers Association of Nigeria (HURIWA) condemned President Bola Tinubu’s presentation of the 2025 budget for Rivers State to the National Assembly for approval . HURIWA described it as an unconstitutional and brazen attempt to undermine democracy in the state .
